page.title: 07TRANSPORT
page.content: We picked 2 surveys to compare.In 1 sample survey we had 9 ladies from {Woodley C of E}aged 30-40.In the other was 18 men from{Beechwood}of the same age.In the ladies survey the daily car use was 44%the mens was 84%.Daily bus use was 11% in both surveys.The men worked in a wider area which includes {London,High Wycombe}&{abroad.}The ladies area covered only{Reading, {Woodley,Earley}&{Wokingham.}22% of the men get petrol at certain garages because of cheapness but 33% of the ladies because of the same reason.In the mens survey 83% of the cars were {British.}In the ladies the figure was 55%.33% of the ladies travel daily 1 mile.The men travel daily a larger distance.66% of the men travel weekly {100 miles}but none of the ladies travel that distance.
